version_description:
This major update adds features and improves usability.
-User interface updated to use “slideout” navigation with more content categories.
-Adds paging in content views to maximize speed, minimize cumbersome tapping of buttons.
-Local events c

New Top 10 section
Sharing, memory, analytics and miscellaneous improvements

• Redesigned look
• Enhanced tools for managing notifications
• Streamlined navigation menu
• No login required; all content is now free to all users
• Content now grouped in broader categories for swift navigation article to article; no need

Supports both iPhone and iPad
Supports collections
Improved search
Other improvements and bug fixes

Add location to places search
Bug fixes and minor improvements

Local and More added to search
Other improvements and bug fixes
Branding, minor improvements and bug fixes.

New Features:
• The user interface has been redesigned to make it quicker and easier to keep up with the latest local news and events.
• Move between stories quickly with side-to-side article swiping.
